resources.string: Description: Green means this device is vulnerable using DirtyPipe(https://github.com/polygraphene/DirtyPipe-Android), red is invulnerable
This may brick your device and cuase your data loss, continue?
Your device can gain root by DirtyPipe, Click Settings to continue.

Please wait about 30s, and the Magisk would be installed. Warning:
 1. Don't use install button on magisk app. It will brick your phone.
 2. Don't reboot even if Magisk app request. It will lose temporary root.
 3. Only support root access. No magisk/zygisk modules support.
Please confirm again that you should not INSTALL Magisk in Magisk App!!!! YOUR DEVICE WOULD BE BRICK !!!
